infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Allow Rozy to use your location so you can easily add location to your roses to remember where you met them
infoPlist.NSCalendarsUsageDescription: Allow Rozy to interact with your calendar so you can save special events
infoPlist.NSRemindersUsageDescription: Allow Rozy to interact with your reminders so you can recall special events
infoPlist.NSContactsUsageDescription: Allow Rozy to import your contacts (locally) so you can further personalize and prioritize them in a rose
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Allow Rozy to use the camera to scan barcodes so you can quickly add other's roses!
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Allow Rozy to access photo library so you can upload photos related to your roses
